QuestData.Title: Kum'isha's Endeavors
QuestData.Description: A glimmering sphere sits before you. You sense that this item would be of great value to someone within the Blasted Lands.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Flawless Draenethyst Sphere to Kum'isha the Collector in Blasted Lands.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you found a flawless draenethyst sphere?
QuestData.RewardText: Simply amazing. I had doubted that anyone could find another sphere, yet here it is, pulsating in my hands.$B$BWell done, $n!$B$BShould you find anymore--and I believe this to be an impossibility--return them to me and I shall reward you again.
